Abstract: Smart appliances are widely available in the market but an integrated appliance is still not common since people tend to buy different branded appliances for their home. This paper presents one part of smart appliances in the form of a module that can be attached directly to the present refrigerator. The module was built based on Arduino, Raspberry Pi and sensors which can change an ordinary refrigerator to smart one with its three functions. First, it can inform items stored in the refrigerator. Second, it can order unavailable items to the supplier, and third, it can display recipes according to the items therein. This module is being registered for a simple patent and will be manufactured widely with affordable price. This module will be favorable choice since users don't have to discharge their current refrigerator but change it into a smart one by applying the module. In the future, the module will be expanded to other appliances and each appliance can communicate to each other and save their information in the cloud. Moreover, an Androidbased system has been developed to be installed in the smartphone for online access. © 2018, Internetworking Indonesia.
